title: (x) FF font in banner - FF Jackie {Ignacio}
content:
What's this? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071218164404im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40967.gif)   
   
Fonts used on FF banner @ typophile. FontFont should think on a new way to show the fonts BTW. Couldn't find it on their site.

 [‹ (x) Oakland Tribune headline - Madison (Century 725) {Nicolai}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071218164404/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5696 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) specimen book font - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071218164404/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5683 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
_FontFont should think on a new way to show the fonts BTW._   
   
Agreed, and a new system is underway.   
Good stuff is happening behind the scenes.
